            Biography
            I am a professional working in the field of climate
            analysis and prediction at a government institution. In my
            work, I apply my expertise in data science, utilizing
            programming languages such as R and Python to process and
            analyze data, including spatial data, which is often my
            primary focus. Additionally, I have a deep interest in
            technology, particularly in exploring Linux as the operating
            system I frequently use for various computational tasks.
            Outside of work, I balance my life by playing music,
            especially the guitar, and staying active through running.
            This combination of interests in technology, music, and
            sports helps me grow both professionally and personally. If
            you’d like to download my CV, you can click this link.
             
            
            
            Education
            Bandung Institute of
            Technology | Bandung | M.Sc.
            M.Sc. in Earth Science (Atmospheric Science) | July 2020
            - October 2022
            State College of Meteorology
            Climatology And Geophysics | Bintaro |
            B.A.S
            B.A.S. in Climate Science | September 2013 - October
            2018
             
            
            
            Experience
            BMKG
            Headquarters | Climate Forecaster and Analyst |
            January 2018 - Present
            BMKG Regional IV
            Makassar | Weather & Climate Observer |
            November 2014 - October 2015
